entry.title: Split mp3 in 10 minute segments
entry.content:
Here is how to divide an mp3 file into 10 minute segments with bash and ffmpeg:

``` bash Split audio in 10m segments. for i in {0..$LENGTH_IN_SECONDS..600}; do

ffmpeg -i input_file.mp3 -ss $i -t 600 output.pt$(($i/600)).mp3;

done

```

I used this for an audio book that was in a humongous 6 hour file that sucks because my mp3 player doesnt support bookmarking.
